item.description:
Craving for some fresh spices in the midst of winter? Then kick your taste buds up a notch with an authentic Indian buffet-style lunch at Mantra.

We'll meet at Mantra in downtown Boston at 12pm on Saturday 3/6. Please be punctual if you are joining us for lunch or we'll start without you =P The cost of the buffet is $11.95 plus tax and gratuities.

Afterwards we will head out to Frog Pond in the Boston Common for some ice-skating.
Admission is $4 and rental $8. For more information about Frog Pond, please check out the link:

http://www.bostoncomm...

Please indicate in your RSVP whether you would like to join us for lunch, ice-skating, or both. See you there.
item.how_to_find_us: Please ask for the reservation under "Tony Wang."

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Indian Buffet & Ice-Skating
